title: Helena Yu
author: Helena Yu
created_time: January 20, 2023, 02:34:00 PMLast edit: January 21, 2023, 09:30:52 AM by Helena Yu
content: There's a charity auction created by smoothie to help the victim scammed by Coldkey/yogg. The charity auction is expected will begin from January 31st 2023, you can donate any collectible or you can join the auction for those collectibles that have been donated. Currently there are 23 collectibles have been donated from several forum members (smoothie, Frank AlpenCoin, Henkcryptotank, QuakerBull, Kryptowerk, Est2013, Humble Bitcoiners, DaveF, NovemberMan, geophphreigh, polymerbit, raritycheck, Mbitr, MrCryptHodl, minerjones, and ClayCastCrypto).In order to give an awareness about the charity auction, I've create a charity signature campaign. This is a free campaign, so don't expect you will get paid by wearing the signature, avatar, and personal text.Although it's a free campaign and there's no campaign manager, anyone shouldn't spam or creating low value post. You don't have to leave any application post in order to participate the campaign.This charity campaign will end when the charity auction is already end too. Thank you for everyone who want to be a part in this campaign Avatar (3 Version)    Personal TextCode:Help the victim scammed by ColdKeyJr. Member rank signatureSCAMMED 0.7+ BTC       ★   Charity comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Nice job OP, I will definitely wear signature to join this movement to be part of those that want other people to make progress and happy in this forum. Hope someone is free to leave the campaign at anytime?

comments.author: DiMarxist
comments.body: It is good to partake in this charity signature campaign, and I have done that to start the campaign. I have worn the signature and the personal text.QuoteHelp the victim scammed by ColdKeyDiMarxist

comments.author: zaki12
comments.body: Helping others must be done with sincerity. I want to be part of this charity campaign, I will use my signature and avatar.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on January 20, 2023, 02:34:00 PMThank you for everyone who want to be a part in this campaign I don't think you will receive many interest. It's hard to swallow what yogg did, utterly disgusting but that's between him and the people who trusted his business. If we really need a charity awareness then do it for members who need blessing or even support with money. The situation of yahoo deserves something to show from us. Have a campaign to show love and support for him. There are many members, right now who need money may be for medical expense, food, shelter including all basic needs. Give them a platform to take help from us. We lost many members, may be have a wall of fame in their memory to show them love and respect of whatever they earned from the community.Yogg scammed a group of people. There are many members who are scammed by others. If you think yogg's scam effected people need this awareness then what about those who were scammed by many others? It's not proven, I mean we can not verify but what about julerz12, he seems to be a victim too. Don't you think he needs some support from all of us?Obviously there will be always some people who will abuse everything you will do.

Don't you think he needs some support from all of us?It doesn't mean this charity campaign is wrong right? Hope to participate(Avatar &PT) in this campaign.
